social.hashtagsRequired: At least one hashtag is required
social.socialFeaturesNotSetup: The social features in your CareAI application are not fully set up.
social.socialFeaturesNotSetupDetails: To use the social features in CareAI, you need to set up the database tables and permissions. Follow the instructions below to set up the social features.
social.setupInstructionsDetails: Follow these steps to set up the social features:
social.setupStep1: Log in to your Supabase dashboard
social.setupStep4: Copy and paste the SQL script from the fix_social_features.sql file
social.setupNote: After running the script, you can check if the social features are properly set up by refreshing this page.
